channel.title: Read-> HOw to make npc talks?
channel.description:
Hello,
I know how you make the npc talks.. but i want something like this if you click ''Talk''.
I got this: [code] case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bones", 1552); break;[/code]
But i want to make it says [b][u]UNDER[/u][/b] ''5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bones'' The items must be noted!
Thanks. I D D S I

item.title: Read-> HOw to make npc talks?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:1, topic:252012”]Hello,

I know how you make the npc talks…
but i want something like this if you click ‘‘Talk’’.

I got this: case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bones", 1552); break;

But i want to make it says UNDER ‘‘5 Cake’s 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bones’’
The items must be noted!

Thanks. I D D S I[/quote]

look in tutorial section there are a few nice tut’s explaining this

Read full topic
item.source: Read-> HOw to make npc talks?
